New Records: Jeffrey Vandersay's six-wicket haul in the second ODI
Key Match Events: Pathum Nissanka's diving catch to dismiss Rohit Sharma
Kamindu Mendis' screamer at first slip to dismiss Shubman Gill
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka now lead the three-match series 1-0 after the first match ended in a tie
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch had plenty of assistance for the spinners
India were asked to chase down 241 runs
The first match ended in a tie
